heading: Wednesday Night
text: Partly cloudy south. Increasing clouds north, with a chance of snow showers, mainly in the mountains, and in the valleys near the Vermont/Québec border. Lows zero to 10 above, cold spots around 5 below. Northwest 5 to 10 mph and diminishing.

heading: Thursday
text: Becoming mostly sunny in southern valleys. Morning clouds north, with any snow showers giving way to breaks of sunshine. Highs in the low to mid 20s north, mid to upper 20s in the south. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Clear to partly cloudy. Lows from zero to 10 below, cold spots around 15 below. Winds becoming light and variable.
